Class Viewport3DHelper

Namespace
H.Drawing3D.View.Base

Provides extension methods for Viewport3D.

Remarks

See "3D programming for Windows" (Charles Petzold book) and Twelve Days of WPF 3D.

FindNearest(Viewport3D, Point, Predicate<RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult>, out Point3D, out Vector3D, out DependencyObject)

Finds the nearest visual, hit point and its normal at the specified position.

public static bool FindNearest(this Viewport3D viewport, Point position, Predicate<RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult> predicate, out Point3D point, out Vector3D normal, out DependencyObject visual)

Parameters

viewport Viewport3D

The viewport.

position Point

The position.

predicate Predicate<RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult>
point Point3D

The 3D hit point.

normal Vector3D

The normal of the mesh at the hit point.

visual DependencyObject

The hit visual.

Returns

bool

true if a visual was found at the specified position.

UnProject(Viewport3D, Point, Point3D, Vector3D)

Transforms a point from the screen (2D) to a point on plane (3D) 平行于相机的平面上的交点

public static Point3D? UnProject(this Viewport3D viewport, Point p, Point3D position, Vector3D normal)

Parameters

viewport Viewport3D

The viewport.

p Point

The 2D point.

position Point3D

A point in the plane.

normal Vector3D

The plane normal.

Returns

Point3D?

A 3D point.

Remarks

Maps window coordinates to object coordinates like 

gluUnProject
.
